Class EntityUtils

java.lang.Object
com.gr15.pacman.model.entities.EntityUtils
public final class EntityUtils extends Object
Utility class providing helper methods for working with Entity objects.

This class includes methods for calculating distances and detecting collisions between entities in the game world, taking into account their sub-tile positions and radii.

This class is final and cannot be instantiated.

  • Method Details

    • distance

      public static double distance(Entity arg0, Entity arg1)
      Calculates the Euclidean distance between two entities based on their position.
      Parameters:
      arg0 - the first entity (must not be null)
      arg1 - the second entity (mus not be null)
      Returns:
      the distance between the centers of the two entities.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if arg0 or arg1 is null.

    • hasCollided

      public static boolean hasCollided(Entity arg0, Entity arg1)
      Determines whether two entities have collided based on circular collision detection. A collision is detected if the distance between the entities' centers is less than or equal to the sum of their radii.
      Parameters:
      arg0 - the first entity (must not be null)
      arg1 - the second entity (must not be null)
      Returns:
      true if the entities bounding circles intersect or touch; false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if arg0 or arg1 is null
